page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: {SCHOOLS, COLLEGES, COMMUNITY. { {SCHOOLS :}THERE ARE TWELVE SCHOOLS IN OUR BLOCK; TWO COMPREHENSIVE AND TEN PRIMARY, OF WHICH THREE HAVE NURSERY FACILITIES. ALL OF THESE SCHOOLS ARE WELL EQUIPPED AND OFFER UP-TO-DATE TEACHING. {COLLEGES :}THERE IS ONE TECHNICAL COLLEGE OFFERING COURSES IN ELECTRONICS,COMPUTERS,BUSINESS STUDIES,ETC. {COMMUNITY :}COMMUNITY SCHOOLS OFFER FACILITIES (OUT OF SCHOOL HOURS) TO INDIVIDUALS/GROUPS FOR A WIDE RANGE OF RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES.THREE OF OUR SCHOOLS ARE USED IN THIS WAY, AND COMMUNITY EDUCATION IS BEING ENCOURAGED.
